db:abstract.db:para: Provides a debugger for applications that use Qt Script.

db:article.db:para: The Qt Script Tools module provides a debugger that can be embedded into Qt applications that use Qt Script. The debugger enables the application user to inspect the state of the script environment and control script execution.
